item.title: Create Rest Api With Go Gin GORM and Postgres
item.description: In this post we’ll create an API using Go, Gin and GORM, that will allow us to save and fetch todo items from a Postgres database. Project Setup To start the project setup, create a directory (folder) with the name of your project. Here I’ll create a directory named todo-go-backend. Let’s initialize Go module in our project so that we can install libraries using go mod. Run the following command in the project directory:
